statements: UPDATE customer_profiles SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE customer_profiles SET customer_name='Jane Smith', age=30, gender='Female' WHERE customer_id=2;
UPDATE customer_profiles SET age = 25, email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE customer_profiles SET customer_name = 'Alice', gender = 'Female' WHERE customer_id = 456;
UPDATE customer_profiles SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE travel_preferences SET destination = 'Paris', budget = 2000.50, preference_description = 'Exploring the city' WHERE customer_id = 456;
UPDATE customer_profiles SET first_name='Alice', phone_number='123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE travel_preferences SET budget=5000.00, destination='Paris', travel_date='2023-06-15' WHERE customer_id=2;
UPDATE customer_profiles SET age = 30, name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 12345;
UPDATE travel_preferences SET budget = 2000, destination = 'Europe' WHERE preference_id = 54321;
UPDATE customer_profiles SET age = 30, gender = 'Male' WHERE customer_id = 12345;
UPDATE travel_preferences SET budget = 2000, destination = 'Europe' WHERE customer_id = 54321 AND preference_id = 101;
UPDATE customer_profiles SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE travel_preferences SET destination = 'Paris', preferred_airline = 'Air France' WHERE customer_id = 2;
UPDATE customer_profiles SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE travel_preferences SET ticket_class = 'Business Class', destination = 'Paris', preference_level = 5 WHERE customer_id = 456;
UPDATE CustomerProfiles SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE TravelPreferences SET departure_date='2022-08-15', return_date='2022-08-25' WHERE preference_id=5;
UPDATE CustomerProfiles SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe', email='john.doe@example.com', phone_number='123-456-7890', address='123 Main St' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE TravelPreferences SET departure_date='2022-08-15', return_date='2022-08-22', travel_class='Business' WHERE customer_id=1;
